attributes.action: allow the british public more decisions about their lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I propose the goverment makes a secure MAC address logging online referendum site, where ALL major decisions are discussed. To make sure all citizens get the message there can be paper versions sent to people with no access to the internet, and a center for referendum set up in each city. This is to be opt out. With every email sent, if there is no confrmation that it was recived then a paper form is sent.

rejection.details: Please refer the matter to the Ministry of Justice
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
